interface TypingCodeHandlersContextState extends UseTypingActionState {
    handleKeyDown: KeyboardEventHandler<HTMLInputElement>
    handleChangePrintingInput: ChangeEventHandler<HTMLInputElement>
    containerRef: RefObject<HTMLDivElement>
    resultRef: RefObject<HTMLDivElement>
    handleNewText: () => void
    scrollTo: (options: ScrollToOptions, callback?: () => void) => void
    startTyping: () => void
    endTyping: () => void
    resetTyping: () => void
    scrollToResult: (behavior?: ScrollBehavior) => void
    inputRef?: RefObject<HTMLInputElement>
}
